Description:
Position Title:                 Front Desk Patient CoordinatorEmployment Type:        Full TimeSalary:                 depending on experience and qualifications plus monthly commissionsJob Location:                  Dubai, UAE About the Client:An aesthetic clinic based in Dubai, inspired by Southern American concept.Job Description:Greet patients, provide a welcoming atmosphere, and manage their check-in process.
Coordinate appointments, ensuring efficient scheduling and optimal use of clinic.
Upsell aesthetic clinic services to patients, engage in conversations about additional aesthetic services, and educating them about the benefits.
Maintain clear and effective communication with patients regarding appointments, services, and handle general and billing inquiries.
Maintain a clean and organized reception area, manage patient records ensuring accurate documentation.Skills
Skills:
Open to European, South American and Arab nationals
Female, 45 years old and below
Minimum of 3 years related experience from an aesthetic clinic
Home country experience is acceptable

Preferred.Nationality: All Arab Countries; All Eastern European Countries; All GCC Countries; All Western European Countries; Armenia; South Africa; Tajikistan; Ukraine; Uzbekistan

Data.Company Industry: Dental Center & Clinic; Other Healthcare Services
